talk_0010:
Come to me... In the Temple of Time
Ruins...up the road on the plateau to
the south...
talk_0030:
Your being overflows with vigor. There is
no need for more <clr:0000>Stamina Vessels<clr:ffff>.
talk_0011:
Come to me...where I rest in the Temple
of Time Ruins...which stand upon the road
on the plateau to the south...
talk_0012:
...<sp:0:4:0>I am trapped...under the water...behind
the stone gate...of the great plateau...
talk_0002:
You who hear my voice.<sp:0:4:0>As a result of you draining the water from
the gate, a part of me has been freed.
You have earned my gratitude.<sp:0:4:0>I speak to you now from the Depths below
in the guise of this statue...
talk_0022:
You have returned <sp:2:2:4a:440043006f006e006e006500630074005f0046006900720073007400490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006f00740061006c0050006100720074004d0069006e0075007300ffff00cd> of <clr:0000>my eyes<clr:ffff>
to me thus far.<sp:0:4:0>I direct you to the remaining chasms
across this plateau.<sp:0:4:0>Deliver the <clr:0000>eyes <clr:ffff>found near each chasm
to me, where I dwell in the Depths below
this temple.
talk_0023:
When on the surface, <clr:0000>my eyes <clr:ffff>cannot be
taken far from where they rest.<sp:0:4:0>If separated by too great a distance, the
<clr:0000>eye<clr:ffff> will return to its resting place. Keep
this well in mind.
talk_0013:
I direct you to the four chasms across
the plateau above.<sp:0:4:0>Each has one of <clr:0000>my eyes <clr:ffff>nearby—drop
them into the chasms, and then deliver
them to me.
talk_0014:
You have returned <sp:2:2:4a:440043006f006e006e006500630074005f0046006900720073007400490073006c0061006e0064005f0054006f00740061006c0050006100720074004d0069006e0075007300ffff00cd> of <clr:0000>my eyes <clr:ffff>to
me thus far.<sp:0:4:0>After you have found <clr:0000>my eyes <clr:ffff>on the
plateau above, each of them near
a chasm...<sp:0:4:0>bring every last one here to me.
talk_0016:
I direct you to the four chasms across
this plateau.<sp:0:4:0>Each has one of <clr:0000>my eyes <clr:ffff>nearby—drop
them into the chasms.<sp:0:4:0>Then deliver the stones to me, who dwells
in the Depths below this temple.<sp:0:4:0>Do all of this and a reward will be yours.
talk_0026:
The strength that you have chosen will
be yours.
talk_0017:
I direct you to the four chasms across
this plateau.<sp:0:4:0>Each has one of <clr:0000>my eyes <clr:ffff>nearby—drop
them into the chasms.<sp:0:4:0>Then deliver the stones to me, where I
dwell in the Depths below this temple.
talk_0018:
You have returned to me my eyes,
the vessels of my spirit. We can now
speak properly.<sp:0:4:0>In ancient times, my eyes were stolen
and sealed away.<sp:0:4:0>For eons I have awaited one who would
hear my voice and return them to me...
And here you are.<sp:0:4:0>As promised, I will repay your kindness by
bestowing good fortune upon you.
talk_0029:
Your life force already tests the seams of
your being. There is no need for more
<clr:0000>Heart Containers<clr:ffff>.
talk_0019:
Do you have any wayward spirits known
as <clr:0000>Poes <clr:ffff>in hand?<sp:0:4:0>If it is further strength you desire, then
come to me again bearing Poes...
